thread.title: Tech meltdown sparks late-day market plunge

title: Tech meltdown sparks late-day market plunge
text:
Tech meltdown sparks late-day market plunge Tuesday, March 27, 2018 - 01:43 
A late-hour sell-off in tech shares dragged the entire market lower as lingering worries about the future of social media companies and self-driving cars weighed heavily on investor confidence.   
A late-hour sell-off in tech shares dragged the entire market lower as lingering worries about the future of social media companies and self-driving cars weighed heavily on investor confidence.  //reut.rs/2pL1Ac4
